channel.title: Rock Food Crobar Metal Mom on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Rock Food Crobar Metal Mom on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: METALLICA!!!
item.description: haha. so this weekend was pretty ridiculous. it was generally out of control. basically I just hung out and did the things that make my life incredible. haha. it all started on Wednesday (of course). so for the past couple weeks I have been working nights a lot. so I have also had a LOT of screwed up sleep - i.e. none. especially at night. soo… on Wednesday I was struggling with attempting to not stay up all night - so I hung out at home and though about sleeping.
